general.name: mos_target_bhm_spiders_clusters_superset
general.description: One of several tables describing optical/IR counterparts to eROSITA X-ray sources identified via various methods.  These tables contain a superset of potential targets from which the SDSS-V spectroscopic targets were drawn.  The dr19_bhm_spiders_clusters_superset table includes counterparts selected via algorithms optimised to find clusters of galaxies. Each row corresponds to one possible match between an X-ray source and a potential optical/IR counterpart.  The X-ray columns (ero_*) record the eROSITA information known at the time of target selection and may differ from publicly available eROSITA catalogs. The dr19_bhm_spiders_*_superset tables are derived from eROSITA observations of the eROSITA Final Equatorial Depth performance verification field ('eFEDS').

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

ero_version.name: ero_version
ero_version.description: Identifier giving the eROSITA dataset and processing version e.g. 'eFEDS_c940', 'em01_c946_201008_poscorr' etc

ero_detuid.name: ero_detuid
ero_detuid.description: The standard official eROSITA unique detection identifier, e.g. 'em01_123456_020_ML12345_001_c946' etc

ero_flux.name: ero_flux
ero_flux.description: X-ray flux, usually in the main eROSITA detection band (0.2-2.3keV).

ero_ext_like.name: ero_ext_like
ero_ext_like.description: Likelihood of X-ray source being extended

ero_ra.name: ero_ra
ero_ra.description: Best determination of X-ray position, J2000

ero_dec.name: ero_dec
ero_dec.description: Best determination of X-ray position, J2000

ero_radec_err.name: ero_radec_err
ero_radec_err.description: Best estimate of X-ray position uncertainty

xmatch_method.name: xmatch_method
xmatch_method.description: The X-ray-to-optical/IR cross-match method that was used in this case e.g. 'XPS-ML/NWAY', 'CLUSTERS_EFEDS_MULTIPLE' etc

xmatch_version.name: xmatch_version
xmatch_version.description: The cross-match software version and OIR catalog used e.g. 'LSdr8-JWMS_v2.1LSdr8-JWMS_v2.1', 'LSdr8-AG_v1,JC_16032020', 'eromapper_2020-10-12', 'CW20ps1dr2-v011220' etc

xmatch_dist.name: xmatch_dist
xmatch_dist.description: Distance between X-ray position and optical counterpart

xmatch_metric.name: xmatch_metric
xmatch_metric.description: Metric giving quality of cross-match. Meaning is dependent on xmatch_method, e.g. p_any for NWAY

xmatch_flags.name: xmatch_flags
xmatch_flags.description: Flags indicating cross-match properties (e.g. status flags), xmatch_method dependent

target_class.name: target_class
target_class.description: Best guess of source classification at time of xmatch e.g. 'GALAXY','STAR','QSO','UNKNOWN',....

target_priority.name: target_priority
target_priority.description: Relative to other targets in this catalog, interpreted/adapted later to derive a final target priority

target_has_spec.name: target_has_spec
target_has_spec.description: Flags used to indicate if target has good quality archival spectroscopy available

best_opt.name: best_opt
best_opt.description: Describes which OIR survey provided the optical counterpart for this row of the table, i.e. which OIR cat gives the entries in fields opt_ra, opt_dec, opt_pmra, opt_pmdec, opt_epoch, and which OIR identifier is given in the *_id columns

ls_id.name: ls_id
ls_id.description: Identifier of counterpart (if any) in dr19_legacy_survey_dr8 ('ls_id' field). Arithmetically derived from legacysurvey sweep file columns: release, brickid and objid:  ls_id = objid + (brickid * 2**16) + (release * 2**40)

ps1_dr2_objid.name: ps1_dr2_objid
ps1_dr2_objid.description: Identifier of counterpart (if any) in dr19_panstarrs1 (catid_objid field). Identical to MAST 'ippObjID' identifier

gaia_dr2_source_id.name: gaia_dr2_source_id
gaia_dr2_source_id.description: Identifier of counterpart (if any) in dr19_gaia_dr2_source ('source_id' field)

unwise_dr1_objid.name: unwise_dr1_objid
unwise_dr1_objid.description: Identifier of counterpart (if any) in dr19_unwise (not used)

des_dr1_coadd_object_id.name: des_dr1_coadd_object_id
des_dr1_coadd_object_id.description: Identifier of counterpart (if any) in DES/dr1 coadd catalogg (not used)

sdss_dr16_objid.name: sdss_dr16_objid
sdss_dr16_objid.description: Identifier of counterpart (if any) in SDSS dr16 photobj table (not used)

opt_ra.name: opt_ra
opt_ra.description: Sky coordinate of optical/IR counterpart, included for validity checks only

opt_dec.name: opt_dec
opt_dec.description: Sky coordinate of optical/IR counterpart, included for validity checks only

opt_pmra.name: opt_pmra
opt_pmra.description: Proper motion of optical/IR counterpart, included for validity checks only

opt_pmdec.name: opt_pmdec
opt_pmdec.description: Proper motion of optical/IR counterpart, included for validity checks only

opt_modelflux_g.name: opt_modelflux_g
opt_modelflux_g.description: optical magnitude of counterpart, included for validity checks only

opt_modelflux_ivar_g.name: opt_modelflux_ivar_g
opt_modelflux_ivar_g.description: uncertainty on optical magnitude of counterpart, included for validity checks only

opt_modelflux_r.name: opt_modelflux_r
opt_modelflux_r.description: optical magnitude of counterpart, included for validity checks only

opt_modelflux_ivar_r.name: opt_modelflux_ivar_r
opt_modelflux_ivar_r.description: uncertainty on optical magnitude of counterpart, included for validity checks only

opt_modelflux_i.name: opt_modelflux_i
opt_modelflux_i.description: optical magnitude of counterpart, included for validity checks only

opt_modelflux_ivar_i.name: opt_modelflux_ivar_i
opt_modelflux_ivar_i.description: uncertainty on optical magnitude of counterpart, included for validity checks only

opt_modelflux_z.name: opt_modelflux_z
opt_modelflux_z.description: optical magnitude of counterpart, included for validity checks only

opt_modelflux_ivar_z.name: opt_modelflux_ivar_z
opt_modelflux_ivar_z.description: uncertainty on optical magnitude of counterpart, included for validity checks only
